<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_map"><sys_transform_map action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><copy_empty_fields>false</copy_empty_fields><create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields>false</create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields><enforce_mandatory_fields>No</enforce_mandatory_fields><name>User Badges Import set</name><order>100</order><run_business_rules>true</run_business_rules><run_script>true</run_script><script><![CDATA[(function transformRow(source, target, map, log, isUpdate) {
    var rec = new GlideRecordSecure('x_aleen_badgeoff_user_badges');
    rec.addQuery('parent_request_id', source.u_parent_request_id);
    rec.query();
    while (rec.next()) {
        rec.setValue('alert_badge_status', source.u_alert_badge_status);
        gs.info('updating status');
        rec.update();
    }
    //TODO:: based on feedback we need to enhance
    // if source.u_alertprovisionstatus == true i.e., success close badge request
    // badgestatus == active  to..
    // badgestatus  == inactive  update

})(source, target, map, log, action === "update");]]></script><source_table>x_aleen_badgeoff_user_badges_import_set</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_map</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-11-26 17:07:29</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>64792e9cdbb06c10c34541deaa9619f2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>User Badges Import set</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BadgeOfficer" source="x_aleen_badgeoff">45d0a9d8dbfc2c10c34541deaa961990</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="BadgeOfficer">45d0a9d8dbfc2c10c34541deaa961990</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_map_64792e9cdbb06c10c34541deaa9619f2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-11-26 17:11:54</sys_updated_on><target_table>x_aleen_badgeoff_user_badges</target_table></sys_transform_map></record_update>
